describe: Cyprus is an island country in the Eastern Mediterranean, known for its rich history, stunning beaches, and vibrant culture. It is the third largest and third most populous island in the Mediterranean, with a diverse cultural heritage influenced by both Greek and Turkish traditions.

cities.geographical_location: Located in the center of the island, Nicosia is the capital and largest city of Cyprus.
cities.climate: Nicosia experiences a hot semi-arid climate with long, hot summers and mild winters.

cities.geographical_location: Situated on the southern coast of Cyprus, Limassol is a major port city.
cities.climate: Limassol has a subtropical Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.geographical_location: Located on the southwest coast of Cyprus, Paphos is known for its archaeological sites.
